headline.main: Mexico Opens Migrant Defense Centers at U.S. Consulates
headline.print_headline: Mexico Opens Migrant Defense Centers at U.S. Consulates

lead_paragraph: Mexico opened legal aid centers at its 50 consulates across the United States on Saturday to defend its citizens, the Mexican government said, amid worries of a crackdown on illegal immigration under U.S. President Donald Trump.
snippet: Mexico opened legal aid centers at its 50 consulates across the United States on Saturday to defend its citizens, the Mexican government said, amid worries of a crackdown on illegal immigration under U.S. President Donald Trump....
